entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
